Description: Lower body sherd of large Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed (fired reddish and partly worn) with traces of two bands in added white; exterior: traces of brown maeander pattern above a band; below, two rays; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0086) (phase 2)
